title: Apoorva Nakshi Haaram: Emerald & Ruby Embellished Bridal Necklace
materials: Rubies (Ratnalu) - Round Cut. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: This exquisite haaram features a classic circular link design, each meticulously set with sparkling CZ stones, emeralds, and rubies in a floral pattern. The centerpiece pendant showcases intricate nakshi work detailing peacocks and floral motifs. The drop pendant has three hanging golden balls. The design reflects traditional South Indian temple jewelry motifs with a modern appeal.
colors: Predominantly gold with striking green (emerald) and red (ruby) accents. The white of the CZ stones provides a brilliant contrast
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Perfect for brides
this haaram can also be worn at Seemantham ceremonies
and festive occasions like Sankranti and Diwali.
description: This haaram is a timeless investment, showcasing exquisite craftsmanship and cultural significance. The combination of traditional design with high-quality materials ensures both beauty and durability. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a long-lasting shine, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come. The use of natural gemstones (emeralds and rubies) adds significant value and symbolizes prosperity and good health.
